# Tolle UI Documentation

Modern UI component library for Angular built with Tailwind CSS and the Angular CDK.

- [Full Context Documentation](llms-ctx.txt): For AI agents to ingest the entire library.
- [GitHub](https://github.com/kojo-io/tolle-ui)
- [Official Docs](https://tolle-ui.example.com)

## Components
- accordion-docs
- alert-dialog-docs
- alert-docs
- aspect-ratio-docs
- avatar-docs
- badge-docs
- breadcrumb-docs
- button-docs
- button-group-docs
- calendar-docs
- calendar-range-docs
- card-docs
- carousel-docs
- check-box-docs
- collapsible-docs
- context-menu-docs
- data-table-docs
- date-picker-docs
- date-range-picker-docs
- dropdown-menu-docs
- empty-state-docs
- getting-started-docs
- hover-card-docs
- input-docs
- label-docs
- masked-input-docs
- multi-select-docs
- otp-docs
- pagination-docs
- popover-docs
- progress-docs
- radio-group-docs
- resizable-docs
- scroll-area-docs
- segment-docs
- separator-docs
- sheet-docs
- sidebar-docs
- skeleton-docs
- slider-docs
- switch-docs
- tabs-docs
- textarea-docs
- theming-docs
- toaster-docs

- tooltip-docs
